turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello. Where would you like me to order a coffee from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want Starbucks. I love their coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What is the address of the nearest location to you? If you need assistance, I can look up the nearest locations.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, it's fine. Let's do the Starbucks on 128th Street in Manhattan

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Excellent. Which type of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time would you like your beverage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will put the order in for you. Is there anything else you need?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will send you the confirmation and receipt to your mobile device.
